pkgmetadata.longdescription: Econometric Production Analysis with Ray-Based Distance Functions // Econometric analysis of multiple-input-multiple-output production technologies with ray-based input distance functions as suggested by Price and Henningsen (2022): "A Ray-Based Input Distance Function to Model Zero-Valued Output Quantities: Derivation and an Empirical Application", https://ideas.repec.org/p/foi/wpaper/2022_03.html.
